attributes.action: Work from home for all companies during Coronavirus
attributes.additional_details: Without the government urge, companies would not encourage their employees to work from home.
attributes.background: The public would like the government to urge companies in any sizes to encourage their emplyees to work from home asap in addition to taking urgent actions to prevent further spread.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300439

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
